review: The good: easy to use, tons of apps, Amazon Prime TV, movies, music, all work great, as do the PBS and PBS Kids apps. Customer service is top-notch.The bad: First box I received blew out in less than an hour. Received a replacement from Amazon in a couple days. This one has worked fine. But....Netflix app doesn't work, ESPN app doesn't work, MLB TV app buffers every minute or so (I don't have a buffering problem with MLB on any other device in my house). No solution visible through customer service. Just have to ride out these growing pains.
